titleStmt.title: The coblers prophesie. Written by Robert Wilson. Gent
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Robert, d. 1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Danter for Cuthbert Burbie: and are to be sold at his shop nere the Royall-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" with rows of ornaments; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
